unnormalised: **Energy & Utilities: Gas Cylinder Prices Pinching Pockets Again!**
normalised: **Energy and Utilities: Gas Cylinder Prices Pinching Pockets Again!**

unnormalised: Namaste folks! That monthly dread is back – the gas cylinder price hike. Seems like Maa Durga's blessings aren’t extending to our wallets this time around.
normalised: Namaste folks! That monthly dread is back – the gas cylinder price hike. Seems like Maa Durga's blessings aren’t extending to our wallets this time around.

unnormalised: Sources say that Bharat Gas and Indane have both increased domestic cylinder prices by Rs. 50. Yep, you read that right. Now, a cylinder in Delhi will set you back around Rs. 1100, give or take. Ouch!
normalised: Sources say that Bharat Gas and Indane have both increased domestic cylinder prices by rupee fifty. Yep, you read that right. Now, a cylinder in Delhi will set you back around rupee one thousand one hundred, give or take. Ouch!

unnormalised: Dr. Sharma from the Indian Institute of Petroleum Economics says this is due to fluctuating global crude oil prices and the weakening Rupee. He also mentioned something about increased demand for gas in the upcoming festive season.
normalised: Doctor Sharma from the Indian Institute of Petroleum Economics says this is due to fluctuating global crude oil prices and the weakening Rupee. He also mentioned something about increased demand for gas in the upcoming festive season.

unnormalised: So, what’s a common man to do? Rationing aloo parathas, maybe? Time to dust off those old chulhas in the backyard? Just kidding! (Mostly).
normalised: So, what’s a common man to do? Rationing aloo parathas, maybe? Time to dust off those old chulhas in the backyard? Just kidding! (Mostly).

unnormalised: On a related note, the price of commercial cylinders, often used by restaurants and chai walas across India (especially that one near my house at Sector 17, Chandigarh!), has also seen a jump. Expect that extra cup of chai to cost you a bit more now.
normalised: On a related note, the price of commercial cylinders, often used by restaurants and chai walas across India (especially that one near my house at Sector seventeen, Chandigarh!), has also seen a jump. Expect that extra cup of chai to cost you a bit more now.

unnormalised: Maybe it's time to explore other cooking options like those fancy induction stoves or even solar cookers. Save some Rs. and some sq ft space! Stay tuned for more updates, and stay warm (but not too warm – save the gas!).
normalised: Maybe it's time to explore other cooking options like those fancy induction stoves or even solar cookers. Save some rupees and some square feet space! Stay tuned for more updates, and stay warm (but not too warm – save the gas!).
